content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=39.5 y=-79.5)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=41.5 y=-78.5)
-  Stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler(position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and steam engine(position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belt(position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport belt(position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drill but being out of fuel
 -  Make sure to provide fuel to the burner mining drill before using it
### Errors when using stone furnace but having no ingredients
 -  Ensure that the stone furnace has the necessary ingredients before using it
### Errors when using offshore pump but having no fuel in the boiler
 -  Make sure to provide fuel to the boiler before using the offshore pump
### Errors when using steam engine but not being connected to the electric network
 -  Ensure that the steam engine is connected to the electric network before using it
### Errors when using burner inserter but having no source items
 -  Make sure to provide source items to the burner inserter before using it
### Errors when using pipe group but being empty
 -  Ensure that the pipe group is not empty before using it
### Errors when using electricity group but not being plugged into the electric network
 -  Make sure to plug the electricity group into the electric network before using it
### Errors when using belt group but being empty
 -  Ensure that the belt group is not empty before using it

### NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* No important variables have been assigned.
